alert.note: Alert for Duchesne (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 3:49PM MDT until June 30 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Duchesne County in northern Utah... * Until 430 PM MDT * At 348 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles southeast of Duchesne, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Duchesne County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
